headline: Zion, Kawhi, Pop and the Olympics: Here’s 2020 in Review
abstract: Breaking out the crystal roundball for some (almost) fearless predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020.
lead_paragraph: It’s a must this time of year: Let’s break out the crystal roundball to share eight more (almost) fearless predictions for the N.B.A. in 2020.
